definitions.definition: A whirring or hissing sound (as above).
Someone who is remarkably skilled at something.
(especially with the verb "take") An act of urination.
definitions.example: I have to take a whiz.

definitions.definition: Amphetamine.
(with "the") Pickpocketing.
To make a whirring or hissing sound, similar to that of an object speeding through the air.
To rush or move swiftly with such a sound.
To throw or spin rapidly.
To urinate.
Against.
definitions.example: He picked a fight with the class bully.

definitions.definition: In the company of; alongside, close to; near to.
In addition to; as an accessory to.
definitions.example: She owns a motorcycle with a sidecar.

definitions.definition: Used to indicate simultaneous happening, or immediate succession or consequence.
definitions.example: Jim was listening to Bach with his eyes closed.

definitions.definition: In support of.
definitions.example: We are with you all the way.

definitions.definition: In regard to.
definitions.example: He was pleased with the outcome.

definitions.definition: To denote the accomplishment of cause, means, instrument, etc; – sometimes equivalent to by.
Using as an instrument; by means of.
definitions.example: Find what you want instantly with our search engine.

definitions.definition: Using as nourishment; more recently replaced by on.
Having, owning.
definitions.example: It was small and bumpy, with a tinge of orange.

definitions.definition: Affected by (a certain emotion or condition).
definitions.example: He spoke with sadness in his voice.

definitions.definition: Prompted by (a certain emotion).
definitions.example: green with envy; flushed with success
